summary: The diff implements the majority of the 14 requirements including all 8 page components, global design system, navbar/footer, routing (via TanStack Router instead of React Router), backend Motoko actor, custom cursor, page load animation, GlassCard, scroll reveal, dark/light theme, and most visual features. Several specific requirements are partially or potentially missing based on the truncated diff evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: All routing must be client-side React Router (react-router-dom). The implementation uses @tanstack/react-router instead.
missing_requirements.reason: The build request explicitly requires 'All routing is client-side React Router; no server-side rendering' and REQ-12 specifies React Router-based routing. The diff uses @tanstack/react-router throughout App.tsx and all page components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero right side should have an abstract 3D-style tech visual (Three.js scene with floating geometric shapes or animated SVG). The parallax hero right side appears to use only CSS-animated border circles and particle dots, not a Three.js scene.
missing_requirements.reason: The spec explicitly requests a Three.js scene or animated SVG on the right side of the hero. The diff shows only CSS circles and floating dots with no Three.js import or canvas element.

missing_requirements.requirement: The About page team section should include 6 portrait placeholders. The diff only defines 5 team members (team-1 through team-5).
missing_requirements.reason: REQ-14 and REQ-5 both require 6 team portrait placeholders. The About.tsx team array only has 5 entries.

missing_requirements.requirement: Gallery category filter should include All, Events, Products, Office per the spec. The diff implements an extra Webinars category not in the spec for Gallery.
missing_requirements.reason: REQ-10 specifies exactly four categories: All, Events, Products, Office. The Gallery.tsx adds a fifth Webinars category not specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend actor should use a stable array or stable HashMap for persistence across upgrades.
missing_requirements.reason: The Motoko actor uses 'let contactList = List.empty()' and 'var nextId = 0' without the 'stable' keyword, which means state will not persist across canister upgrades as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Smooth page transitions â€” fade or slide between routes (300ms ease-in-out) should be implemented for route changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows page-fade-in class applied per page but no route-change transition orchestration wrapper is visible. No animated transition component bridging route changes is shown.

hallucinated_features.description: getContactsSorted() function added to the backend actor with ascending/descending timestamp sorting.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only requires submitContact() and getContacts() functions. The getContactsSorted() function was not requested in REQ-13.

hallucinated_features.description: Gallery page includes a Webinars category in addition to the specified All/Events/Products/Office categories.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-10 explicitly lists only four categories for the Gallery: All, Events, Products, Office. Webinars is not listed as a gallery category.

hallucinated_features.description: MixinStorage blob-storage mixin is imported and included in the backend actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-13 only requires a contact message storage actor. No blob storage or file upload capability was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: ContactMessage module with compareByTimestampAsc and compareByTimestampDesc sorting functions added to backend.
hallucinated_features.reason: These sorting utilities support the unrequested getContactsSorted() function. Not part of any specified requirement.
